```{r load-data}
library(tidyverse) 
library(tidymodels)
library(stringr)
pass <- read.csv("data/pass.csv")
```

also: https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/blob/master/data/2021/2021-03-02/readme.md

https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/blob/master/data/2021/2021-03-02/youtube.csv

```{r edit-data}

pass_more <- pass |>
  mutate(pass_length = nchar(password),
         num_digits = str_count(password, "[0-9]"),
         num_letters = str_count(password, "[a-z]"),
         num_random = pass_length - (num_digits + num_letters))
```
